name: Deskare
longDescription:

examplePrompts.prompt: @Deskare Can you help me organize my hybrid work schedule for next week?
examplePrompts.description: User is asking the bot to assist in organizing their hybrid work schedule.

examplePrompts.prompt: @Deskare I need to book a flex office for Wednesday afternoon.
